abstract: Texas Rangers pitcher C J Wilson is busy preparing with team for Game 1 of World Series against St Louis Cardinals.
snippet: Starting pitcher C. J. Wilson used a chance encounter with Jim Palmer and many other tutorials from players and coaches to forge a successful major league career.
lead_paragraph: Starting pitcher C. J. Wilson used a chance encounter with Jim Palmer and many other tutorials from players and coaches to forge a successful major league career.

headline.main: Rangers Turn to Wilson, Their Ace and Student of the Game
headline.print_headline: Rangers Turn to Wilson, Their Ace and Student of the Game
headline.seo: World Series: Rangers Turn to Wilson in Game 1 Against Cardinals
